actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to make the term of service of the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration 7 years.

summary.text: Limits the term of service of the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to seven years. Prohibits the Administrator from serving more than one seven-year term.

titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to make the term of service of the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration 7 years.
